meanings.definition: The quality or state of being late.
meanings.sent1: Her constant lateness to work was starting to affect her reputation.
meanings.sent2: The lateness of the train caused many passengers to miss their appointments.
meanings.sent3: The lateness of the bus driver made everyone on board chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The lateness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The lateness of the delivery was so extreme that it became a running joke among the staff.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being tardy or delayed.
meanings.sent1: The lateness of the student was due to heavy traffic on the roads.
meanings.sent2: We were all surprised by the lateness of the mail delivery that day.
meanings.sent3: The lateness of the meeting made it feel more like a casual gathering.
meanings.sent4: The lateness of the flowers blooming in winter was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent5: The lateness of the snowfall caught everyone off guard.
